member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ThemeColor
member.summary: Represents possible color variants for the Microsoft themes.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ThemeColor.Homestead
member.summary: Used by the Luna theme; the localized color name is Olive.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ThemeColor.Metallic
member.summary: Used by the Luna theme; the localized color name is Sliver.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ThemeColor.NormalColor
member.summary: Used by the Luna, Aero, and Classic themes; the localized color name is Blue.
